recommender

Class IICollaborativeFiltering

  • java.lang.Object
    • recommender.BaseRecommender
      • recommender.IICollaborativeFiltering

  • public class IICollaborativeFiltering
extends BaseRecommender
    The Item-Item Collaborative Filtering Algorithm using Vector Cosine Similarity

    • Constructor Detail

      • IICollaborativeFiltering

        public IICollaborativeFiltering(DAO dao,
                        int NEIGHBORHOOD_SIZE,
                        int MIN_NEIGHBORS)
        Parameters:
        dao - The Data Access Object built on top of the training and test data set.
        NEIGHBORHOOD_SIZE - The maximum number of neighbors of each item. We used a value of 1116 on the Movielens 100K dataset. Increasing the neighborhood size increases memory and time requirements of the algorithm. Too small neighborhood size may limit the coverage of the algorithm. Both too small or too large neighborhood may increase the error.
        MIN_NEIGHBORS - Minimum number of neighbors that an item must have, which have been rated by a given user, before we can predict a rating for the item. We used a value of 10 on the Movielens 100K dataset. Too small a value may increase the error while too large a value may decrease the coverage drastically.

    • Method Detail

      • computeSimilaritybwAllPairs

        private void computeSimilaritybwAllPairs()
        Computes and stores vector cosine similarity between all item pairs (u, v). Since vector similarity is symmetric, it needs to be calculated only for one half of all the items pairs (u, v).

      • findNeighbors

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findNeighbors(int item)
        Returns:
        a list, of size at most @NEIGHBORHOOD_SIZE, of most similar neighbors of @item

      • getIISimilarity

        private double getIISimilarity(int u,
                     int v)
        Returns:
        the vector cosine similarity between rating vectors of items @u and @v Since vector similarity is symmetric, it needs to be calculated only for one half of all the items pairs (u, v).

      • predict

        public double predict(int user,
             int item)
        This method overrides the predict() method in the BaseRecommender class.
        Overrides:
        predict in class BaseRecommender
        Returns:
        the predicted rating that @user will assign to @item, or Double.NEGATIVE_INFINITY if a prediction cannot be made

      • train

        public void train()
        This method overrides the train() method in the BaseRecommender class and finds neighbors for each item.
        Overrides:
        train in class BaseRecommender

      • VectorCosineSimilarity

        private double VectorCosineSimilarity(int u,
                            int v)
        Returns:
        the vector cosine similarity between rating vectors of items @u and @v, @u < @v
